plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutomaticCheckEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/number() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutomaticCheckEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/number() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutoUpdate']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.commerce.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='ConfigDataInstall']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='CriticalUpdateInstall']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutoUpdate']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.commerce.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='ControllerPowerState']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.Bluetooth.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='menuExtras']/following-sibling::*[1] in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.systemuiserver.plist operation pattern match datatype string and value /System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/Bluetooth.menu
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='wvous-tl-corner']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.dock operation not equal datatype int and value 6

Ensure /plist/dict/key/following-sibling::*[1]/key[text()='Enabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0
Ensure /plist/dict/key[contains(text(), 'Activated')]/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.AssetCache.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[contains(text(), 'DisableAirDrop')]/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.NetworkBrowser.plist operation equals datatype string and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation greater than or equal datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation less than or equal datatype int and value 2
Ensure firewall stealth mode is enabled
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='forceLimitAdTracking']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.AdLib.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='SecureKeyboardEntry']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Terminal operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict[key = 'com.apple.digihub.blank.cd.appeared']/dict/string/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.digihub.plist operation equals datatype string and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict[key = 'com.apple.digihub.blank.dvd.appeared']/dict/string/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.digihub.plist operation equals datatype string and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict[key = 'com.apple.digihub.cd.music.appeared']/dict/string/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.digihub.plist operation equals datatype string and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict[key = 'com.apple.digihub.cd.picture.appeared']/dict/string/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.digihub.plist operation equals datatype string and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict[key = 'com.apple.digihub.dvd.video.appeared']/dict/string/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.digihub.plist operation equals datatype string and value 1
Ensure Firewall logging is enabled
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='NoMulticastAdvertisements']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.mDNSResponder.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true

Ensure /plist/dict/key[.='menuExtras']/following-sibling::*[1]/string[.='/System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/AirPort.menu']/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.systemuiserver.plist operation equals datatype string and value /System/Library/
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='LoginwindowText']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation pattern match datatype string and value ^.+$
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='MultipleSessionEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/.GlobalPreferences.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='DisableLibraryValidation']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.security.librarayvalidation.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='SHOWFULLNAME']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='RetriesUntilHint']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='guestAccess']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.AppleFileServer.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AllowGuestAccess']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.smb.server.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AppleShowAllExtensions']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/.GlobalPreferences.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
